title: Service Learning-Based Mathematics Education Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics education theory and foundational instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Service-learning-based math education design course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Learners collaborate with local community organizations to solve educational challenges

learning_goals: Instructional design problem statements can be formulated by analyzing the mathematical education needs of local community institutions
Educational solution prototypes can be developed through communication with collaborators in service-learning environments
Reflective journals documenting experiences gained through mathematical education design projects can be written and peer feedback exchanged

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
